resources.string: Spend must be greater than amount!
Visitors count must be greater than 0!

"BottlePop is an exclusive mobile application that gets you access to curated nightlife and special events around the world. 
 
Backed by a world Class technology company and a founding team that's known for there champagne popping and vodka guzzling habits you can rest assured that you arein good hands. 
 
Our new ranking algorithm puts you against the bottle popping elite. Now you can see where you stand when it comes to being the king of Nightlife! 
 
Go ahead and book the club of your choice and have a night filled with champagne popping bottles!"

"Having previously used American 
 express centurion card and vertu 
 smartphone concierges, Bottlepop 
 founders know what it takes to 
 deliver world class service 
 Our 24/7 Concierge will give you 
 access to whatever you need, 
 whenever you need."

We at BottlePop provide service for booking tables at London’s most prominent
nightclubs. Once the reservation is made through the app our personal
concierge will contact you on the details provided by you and set you out for the
night with any special requirements that you may have. Once confirmed with the
club, we will get in touch with you to inform if the reservation has been
confirmed and we guarantee a crazy night with bottles popping all around.\n\n Keep the bottles popping and the parties rocking!!!

Our Policies:

 1. We provide a service to book tables on your behalf. Until we haven’t contacted
you personally and got a response from you, please note your table will not be
booked at the club. 

 2. Bottlepop is not responsible for anything that happens inside the club. Our
main responsibility is to reserve a table for our clients at a location of their
choice. 

 3. Access to the exclusive clubs listed is restricted to the club rules and entry
policy. The main requirements to get access to all the listed clubs are as follows:


• Age 18+ (Sometimes may vary depending on the club).


• Identity proof (photo ID card, passport or driver license).


• Dress-code (Ladies - sexy/trendy/smart with heels, NO flat shoes, sandals or flip flops. Gents: smart/elegant, shirt preferred, no sportswear, caps and trainers).


• Well behaved individuals (no drunk people, no drinks or bottles outside the club).

 4. The clubs management has the right to refuse entry if the requirements are not met.
